name: Da Monsters
description:
Da Monsters is a game of skill and luck.

There are forty cute monsters, a la Da Monsters, lie on the board before you, and your job is to clear as many Da Monsters as you can.

On the right, a slot machine will automatically spin and stop on a pair of monsters. Find a pair of adjacent monsters like that on the board, and tap them to remove them from play.

Clearing an entire row will allow more monsters to fall in from the top, and you get a nice score bonus. However, if the slot machine ever produces a pair of monsters that can’t be cleared from the board, it’s game over. The longer you can last, the higher your score is.

But wait, there’s more!

As you reach a certain threshold of points in a game, you’ll unlock a monster pack. Currently, there are 15 monster packs which comprise a grand total of 45 cute and cuddly Da Monsters!
